example.code:
PS C:\> Get-EC2NetworkInterfaceAttribute -NetworkInterfaceId eni-12345678 -Attribute Attachment
Attachment : Amazon.EC2.Model.NetworkInterfaceAttachment
example.description: This example describes the specified network interface.

example.code:
PS C:\> Get-EC2NetworkInterfaceAttribute -NetworkInterfaceId eni-12345678 -Attribute Description
Description : My description
example.description: This example describes the specified network interface.

example.code:
PS C:\> Get-EC2NetworkInterfaceAttribute -NetworkInterfaceId eni-12345678 -Attribute GroupSet
Groups : {my-security-group}
example.description: This example describes the specified network interface.

example.code:
PS C:\> Get-EC2NetworkInterfaceAttribute -NetworkInterfaceId eni-12345678 -Attribute SourceDestCheck
SourceDestCheck : True
example.description: This example describes the specified network interface.
